general_advisory: In case of rain received, go for summer cultivation. The mechanized cultivation will invert the soil and pest and pathogen will be exposed to the sun and get killed. Go for drip irrigation system in Orchard which saves water and saves from heat. Sprinkling irrigation method of irrigation reduces the effect of high temperature. Farmers are advised to avoid exposure outside during the peak heat hours of the day.

advisory: Prepare a well-cultivated dry nursery bed for paddy transplantation with FYM and sow seeds.
Harvest the crop at maturity stage to avoid pod shattering.
Choose good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava and sow seeds after getting good rainfall.
Choose good varieties like Klinga Maize, Prabal and apply basal dose of NPK after final land preparation.
Plant good quality ginger rhizomes like Suprava, Suruchi, Suravi after treating the seeds.
Sow good varieties like Roma, Suroma, Ranga, Rashmi with appropriate seed rate and seed material.
Plant yam with specific seed rate, seed material, and pit preparation.
Manage pests like Foot & Shoot borer and Mites in vegetables using appropriate pesticides.
